topic.title: Cracked World of Warcraft (playing on private servers)
topic.body:
It allows you to play World of Warcraft without paying a subscription, but you play on private servers, not on official ones.


Also, in ZeroTorrent you didn't set `"domain": "zerotorrent.bit"` in root content.json and also some files and .db file name are using name ZeroTalk, it should be ZeroTorrent.
